3M Premasking Tape, SCPM-44X, 48 in x 250 yd (1.2 m x 228.6 m)

entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Masking Tapes
Price: 4.37

[shortdesc]

3M Automotive Masking Tape, 233+, 03431C, green, 0.7 in 104 ft (18 mm x 32 m)

  • 3M™ Automotive Masking Tape, 233+ features a unique green crepe paper backing that is highly conformable for use on the contours of a vehicle
  • The specially formulated adhesive provides the sharpest paint line on a variety of surfaces, including moldings, plastic, glass, metal, rubber and painted surfaces
  • This automotive tape provides clean removal without slivering for up to two days of outdoor exposure, and longer for indoor exposure
  • This tape also has better UV resistance than traditional masking tapes.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Application Headlight Restoration
    Color Green
    Length 104 ft
    Width 0.7 Inch
    Origin Country Canada
    Product Type Masking Tapes

  • Excellent adhesion to a variety of substrates and a sharp paint line
  • Highly conformable, sticks and stays when applied, no lifting or edge curl
  • Resists bleed-through and adhesive transfer
  • For use with water or solvent based paint systems
  • Recommended application temperatures of 60-90ºF with temperature resistance of up to 250ºF (121ºC) for up to 30 minutes

    Product Information

  • Excellent adhesion to a variety of substrates and a sharp paint line
  • Highly conformable, sticks and stays when applied, no lifting or edge curl
  • Resists bleed-through and adhesive transfer
  • For use with water or solvent based paint systems
  • Recommended application temperatures of 60-90ºF with temperature resistance of up to 250ºF (121ºC) for up to 30 minutes

    • Suggested Application

  • Ideal for collision repair applications
